Description: This Vintage V6MRHDX "Summer of Love" Thomsa Blug Signature electric guitar is in excellent condition. It features plenty of relic-ing from the factory but shows very little in the way of previous playwear on top of that. The guitar has a wonderful worn-in feel on the neck and fretboard edges and is a dream to play. The guitar has a great setup and the Wilkinson electronics have plenty of that Vintage-style Strat character! This is an awesome interpretation of the original that fully looks the part at a great price! Summer of Love Signature Thomas BlugIcon SeriesBody: AlderNeck: Maple, bolt-onHeadstock: "Reverse"Fretboard: RosewoodScale: 648 mm21 FretsWilkinson WVC tremolo3 Wilkinson single coilsAged thomann Ivory WVSN (neck)WVSM reverse wound/reverse polarity (middle)WVSB (bridge)Extra WHCC hum-cancelling coil pickups1 Volume knob, 2 tone knobsThomas Blug 'Bukka Push/Push feature on second tone knob5-Way pickup selection switchWilkinson Deluxe WJ55 E-Z-Lok machine headsColour: Distressed Summer of Love design
